name: @interchainjs/cosmos-types
description: Cosmos message codecs and query implementation generated by telescope for cosmos chains
author: Hyperweb <developers@hyperweb.io>

scripts.build: npm run clean; tsc; tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json; npm run copy
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean; tsc --declarationMap; tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json; npm run copy
